00037 /* These structures are defined here so the compiler can allocate enough
00038    memory for them.  However, its fields should be treated as
00039    private.  */
00040 typedef struct
00041 {
00042     port_t port;

00083 /* INFO is a pointer into RAM that stores the state of the MUXLEDS.
00084    CFG is a pointer into ROM to define the port the MUXLEDS is connected to.
00085    The returned handle is passed to the other muxleds_xxx routines to denote
00086    the MUXLEDS to operate on.  */

00088 muxleds_init (muxleds_obj_t *dev, const muxleds_cfg_t *row_cfg,
